data.text:
Platoon by the right, advance in threes from the right of sections.
Platoon Right turn.
Sections left wheel. Quick march.
Sections on the right, will direct platoon threes by the left, into line, on the left, form section.
Platoon threes by the left, on the left, form line of section in threes, at section passage interval, remainder double march.

Platoon by the right, advance in column of sections from the right, remainder right turn. Quick march.
No.2 section commander: Left turn.
Direction: Column by the right.

Platoon by the right, on the right, form column of sections, remainder right turn. Quick march.
No.2 section commander: Left turn.
Direction: Column by the right.

Column by the right, on the left, from inline, remainder left incline. Quick march.

 Remainder right incline. Halt.

Platoon by the right, into column(of section), sections right form.
Direction: By the right.

Column by the right, change direction right, No.1 section right form, forward.
No.2 section right form, forward.

Column by the right, adcance in column of threes from the right, column right turn.

Sections left wheel, quick march.

Direction: Platoon threes by the left.

Column by the left, into line(InLine), Sections left from.

Dir: Platoon by the left.

N.b. This command is given to the left only.

Column by the right, move to the right in column of threes, column right turn.
Section on the left to the front, remainder left wheel. Quick march.

Platoon threes by the left, into column, on the left, form section.

Dir: Platoon by the right.

(At the Halt)
Platoon threes by the left, at the halt, facing left, form column of seciton.
No.1 section left turn.
No.2 section left turn.

(On the move)
Platoon threes by the left, facing left, advance in column of section.
No.1 section left turn.
No.2 section left turn.

Dir: Column by the right.
